nodes.text: Alo Kortessi was a female Clawdite princess. In 4 ABY, the Rebel Alliance operative Kordi Freemaker impersonated her during a mission to obtain embersteel wings. The real Kortessi was arrested by stormtroopers, who mistook her for an impostor.

Alo Kortessi was a Clawdite princess and a member of the Clawdite royal family. In 4 ABY, she attended the Imperial auction on Mygeeto, which was selling starships owned by rebel sympathizers. The rebel operative Kordi Freemaker impersonated her while her brothers Zander and Rowan disguised themselves as her entourage. Kordi managed to use her purported royal status to bully the guards into letting her through. When the real Kortessi arrived, the stormtroopers mistook her for an impostor and arrested her.
Alo Kortessi was a female Clawdite, a green–skinned alien species of shape-changers who could mimic the appearance of other species. She wore purple royal robes.
Alo Kortessi first appeared in the LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures Season Two episode "The Embersteel Blade", which premiered on August 1, 2017. She was voiced by Kari Wahlgren.
